mean_cn: v. 模仿，戏弄；  n. 模仿者
mean_en: to copy the way somebody speaks, moves, behaves, etc., especially in order to make other people laugh; to look or behave like something else
sentence: The panda can perfectly mimic Jin's expression.
sentence_trans: 这只熊猫完美的模仿了金馆长的表情。
word_etyma: mim=mime模拟表演 + ic人 → 模仿者
